title: low priorty lags
body:
i got low priorty for 20 min in the morning i was afk for 4 min and come back to the game.
but everytime i want to play i need to wait 20 min and after 15-17 min the timer restart 
and go back to 20 i dont have a pic maybe later i will have but i try to play like 12 hours and still not working

replies.body:
It sounds like your standing with [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) escalated, so the timer increased.  Leaverbuster is good at preventing whta otherwise would have been another leave, which seems to be the case here if you're timer is messing up.  

This may indicate that your connection is losing sync and cutting you off.  I'm sure that's pretty frustrating, but the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide should help troubleshoot.  You should test it in custom games though, to prevent further leaverbuster issues.
tried everything still restart after 10-15 min my internet is fine everything is good i donk know what the problem is

Even though your internet is good, you can still have issues reaching specific services.  We can try and get a better breakdown to see if we can pinpoint where the issue starts.  Download [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/) and run a route to the game server: 104.160.131.1.  Run it for about 5 minutes, remove the IP only on the first two rows (keep the rest of the info in those rows), and let me know what you find.

-snipping for privacy--
hope i did it right

Okay some good news, it looks like your local network is pretty healthy for the most part!  The bad news, the ISP you're using (either Telia or someone that uses Telia), is messing up your routing.  Once you leave your home network and start traversing your way to us, your connection takes a few hits on the way which is likely the cause of this problem.  

At this point, I highly recommend grabbing those logs and reaching out to your ISP.  Usually requesting a Tier 2 specialist can help to review the logs and send someone out to take a look at those bad hops.

so there is no ohter way to remove this leaverbuster? 
i was waiting like 12 hours (much more than 20 min for 5 games)

It's not something I'm able to do, but you can request it in [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) though I can't make any guarantees.  Just a heads up, though, you'll really want to get this fixed up asap otherwise you'll just get another leavebuster anyway.

Hey, you should be able to just copy and paste the text itself.  The image unfortuantely is too hard to read.  :(  I also don't want to show the first two lines of IP, if you can have those IPs replace with - - - -.

Oh nvm pic looks good now.  Thank you, checking it out now.  :)
